subject: specify test execution order through a property?
msgSnippet: I d like to be able to specify the test execution order (to be random) across all our tests without having to annotate all the tests. Is this possible? Thanks,
messageBody:
I'd like to be able to specify the test execution order (to be random) across all our tests without having to annotate all the tests. Is this possible?

Thanks,
Noel
